Good afternoon {!Contact.FirstName},
I am reaching out to you in regards to a case you have submitted to Support. This case is still open and being investigated by our email specialists. If there have been any changes in this concern regarding new examples or even if the concern has resolved, please reach back to our Support team with your listed ticket number. We will ensure that information is documented and reviewed.
Alternatively, as we investigate further on your case we will be in touch to discuss our findings or advise the next steps that we will take with your case.
We can be reached at 800-980-7488, or you can send an email to support@vinsolutions.com.
If this is no longer a concern, please still reach our Support Team at the number above or simply reply to this email and let us know if you no longer need this case open.
Your case details are below:
Case Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Case Description: {!Case.Dealer_Issue_Description__c}
Thank you very much for your time.
Sincerely,
VinSolutions Support Team
Support@vinsolutions.com
